## Description {#details}

Root of the metadata hierarchy.

This is a root class for typeless data in the IR.

Definition at line 62 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.

## Functions

### dump() {#aedf06cf00de1efbdc1a745946d533b4f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVM&#95;DUMP&#95;METHOD void Metadata::dump () const</>}>
User-friendly dump.

If <code>M</code> is provided, metadata nodes will be numbered canonically; otherwise, pointer addresses are substituted.

Note: this uses an explicit overload instead of default arguments so that the nullptr version is easy to call from a debugger.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h/#l00113">113</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/asmwriter-cpp/#l05337">5337</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/asmwriter-cpp">AsmWriter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### print() {#a451513f65fe632b0369c9f016117263f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void Metadata::print (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M=nullptr, bool IsForDebug=false) const</>}>
Print.

Prints definition of <code>this</code>.

If <code>M</code> is provided, metadata nodes will be numbered canonically; otherwise, pointer addresses are substituted.

Print as operand.

Prints reference of <code>this</code>.

If <code>M</code> is provided, metadata nodes will be numbered canonically; otherwise, pointer addresses are substituted.

Default handling of a changed operand, which asserts.

If subclasses pass themselves in as owners to a tracking node reference, they must provide an implementation of this method.
